name: Roberto colon
text: The employee named tom was great, very friendly brought the pizza out nice and fresh and made sure we had everything we needed. Great place to eat. Only thing was that manager guy scotty for some reason he insisted on telling us he was the manager every 10 minutes.

name: Sage The Truther
text: This place had a good buffet, staff was nice its sad to see this pizza hut go

name: Jan Claggett
text: Only dine in customers but we ended up waiting for an hour and 15 min. They never came to our table for a refill. We finally asked for it to be boxed so we could eat at home. It was cold!

name: Frank Aliacquia
text: The bathroom r very nasty  need to be fixed up...not a place to go  on a date any more. Tables  sticky also.. Not the best place any more ..

text: One of the last best classic pizza huts around!  great lunch buffet!  old school kinda place!

text: Made an order online at 5:30pm, received pizza and breadsticks at 7:20pm. Two hours is too long to wait for a large pizza and an order of breadsticks, especially considering that I live about 2500 ft from this place. Won't be ordering from this place again.
